messages.title: YOUR CLEAR CHOICE ON June 8th
messages.content:
A VOTE FOR PAUL HOLMES AND THERESA MAY:
STRENGTH AND EXPERIENCE
A VOTE FOR THE LABOUR CANDIDATE AND JEREMY CORBYN:
WEAKNESS AND INSTABILITY

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Since 2010 over 1,000 jobs have been created every single day. In Southampton Test, there are now 370 great, local businesses since 2010.
Millions more pupils are going to good or outstanding schools. Southampton schools have received over Â£16m.
1.8 million new apprenticeships have been started since 2010.
There are over 1 million new businesses in Southhampton Test since 2010.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Jeremy Corbyn is only six seats away from forming a government. Don't take the risk.
